title: Wellber no Monogatari: Sisters of Wellber
synopsis: 10 years since the great war, tensions were mounting within the country of Wellber, which was barely capable of keeping peace, as war could commence at any time with its neighboring country, Sangatras. In order to avoid warfare, the king of Wellber, Haidel planned on marrying off his daughter, Princess Rita, to Sangatras` Prince Guernia.
related_anime: ['Wellber no Monogatari: Kanashimi no Senshi Galahad no Banka', 'Wellber no Monogatari: Sisters of Wellber Zwei']
